Random list of ideas to add - I regulary add these in totally random order. https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1-qNQX1Bwwd1cV405Kj1l3B3Mi6K-GvECnMeuzRKfbGA/edit?usp=sharing --- Debian and Ubuntu packages
you will need libvala (available on most debian/ubuntu repos), and vala-language-server (available below) Dependancies
a) Clone this code.. git clone https://github.com/roojs/roobuilder.git b) configure it. meson setup build --prefix=/usr c) make make install ninja -C build install e) run it
Update Package details. dch -U -i (auto increases release..) then edit the about version (check debian/changelog)

flatpak-builder --force-clean --sandbox --install --mirror-screenshots-url=https://dl.flathub.org/repo/screenshots --repo=repo build-dir org.roojs.roobuilder.json flatpak build-bundle repo ../roobuilder.flatpak org.roojs.roobuilder ---
